column1: Received a scholarship for exceptional performance in the humanities.
Participated in a regional debate competition and secured a top position.
Organized a charity event to raise awareness about social justice issues.
Selected as the lead actor in the school play.
Received recognition for outstanding writing skills in creative writing contests.
Published a short story in a literary magazine.
Participated in a public speaking competition and won the second prize.
Volunteered at a local homeless shelter.
Achieved the highest score in the history examination.
Received an award for leadership in the school's debate club.
